subject: JUnitCore Stopping
msgSnippet: Hello, I wan t to ask for a solution to stop and/or destroy a JUnitCore. Like pleaseStop() on the RunNotifier. I already tried ExecutorsService with no
messageBody:
Hello,

I wan't to ask for a solution to stop and/or destroy a JUnitCore.
Like pleaseStop() on the RunNotifier.

I already tried ExecutorsService with no success.
My only not yet tested solution is to System.exit my java programm after starting a new process of it.
